title: Error: Unable to access jarfile paper.jar开服出现这种错误咋办
author: wkjbaby
txt_content: 如题，Error: Unable to access jarfile paper.jar开服出现错误

replies.author: 樱千落妖精
replies.txt_content: paper.jar是你的服务端核心的名字吗？确认一下文件名和bat里的文件名是否一致

replies.author: wkjbaby
replies.txt_content:
樱千落妖精 发表于 2020-4-13 14:52
paper.jar是你的服务端核心的名字吗？确认一下文件名和bat里的文件名是否一致 ...
改了以后又出现了Error: could not open `C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_241\lib\amd64\jvm.cfg'

replies.author: wkjbaby
replies.txt_content: 改了又出现了Error: could not open `C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_241\lib\amd64\jvm.cfg'

replies.author: 樱千落妖精
replies.txt_content:
wkjbaby 发表于 2020-4-13 14:55
改了以后又出现了Error: could not open `C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_241\lib\amd64\jvm.cfg' ...
尝试重装Java

卸载旧的 安装这个  https://c-t.work/s/3b35a3d6d19344

replies.author: Matrixchung
replies.txt_content: 重新安装一个 Java 吧

replies.author: wkjbaby
replies.txt_content:
